sentences.en: A gas in solution diffuses from a region of greater to one of less concentration.
sentences.cn: 溶液中的气体会由浓度高的部分扩散到浓度低的部分.

sentences.en: A gas in solution diffuses from region of greater to one of less concentration.
sentences.cn: 溶液中的气体由浓度较高的区域向浓度较低的区域扩散.

sentences.en: A substance that emits and diffuses a fragranta volatile liquid distilled from flowers or prepared synthetically.
sentences.cn: 使化合使(两个或两个以上物质)合成为单一的物质,如化学合成;混合.

sentences.en: Added monomer diffuses into the micelle for polymerization.
sentences.cn: 加入的单体扩散进入胶团做聚合反应.

sentences.en: From year since halfyear, economic winter diffuses the whole world.
sentences.cn: 自去年下半年以来, 经济寒冬弥漫全球.

sentences.en: He diffuses enthusiasm all around him.
HF ultimately diffuses down to the troposphere where it is removed by wet deposition.
sentences.cn: HF最终扩散到大气中,在大气中它通过湿沉积被除去.

sentences.en: It allows nicotine to diffuse slowly and steadily into the bloodstream.
sentences.cn: 它使尼古丁缓慢、稳步地扩散到血液当中。

sentences.en: Second, it diffuses the weapon's energy so that the final impact causes less damage.
sentences.cn: 其次, 它分散武器的能,降低冲击造成的伤害.

sentences.en: The moisture present in all foods absorbs the flavour of the smoke and eventually diffuses that flavour into its interior.
sentences.cn: 所有食物中都存在的水分会吸收烟味，并最终将其散播到食物内部。

sentences.en: The un - ionized form is usually lipid soluble and diffuses readily across cell membranes.
sentences.cn: 非解离型部分通常为脂溶性,很容易透过细胞膜扩散.

sentences.en: The un - ionized form is usually lipid soluble and diffuses readily across membranes.
sentences.cn: 非解离型部分通常为脂溶性,很轻易透过细胞膜扩散.

sentences.en: While along [ 0 0 1 ] direction, the Gd adatom diffuses by exchanging.
sentences.cn: 而在 [ 001 ] 方向则通过交换机理扩散.

phrases.tran_cn: 漫反射率；漫反射系数；护散反射率

trans.tran_cn: （使光）模糊，漫射，漫散( diffuse的第三人称单数 )，（使）扩散，（使）弥漫，（使）传播
trans.tran_en: To diffuse or be diffused through something means to move and spread through it
